name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-my-approvals
title: My Approvals
shortDescription: This web part demonstrates displaying the list of approval requests of Power Automate. Power Automate provides a new workflow feature that replaces SharePoint workflows, but it is a Power Platform feature, not a Microsoft 365 feature. You can display approval requests from only Power Automate site. This web part enable to display approval requests from SharePoint site.
longDescription: This web part demonstrates displaying the list of approval requests of Power Automate. Power Automate provides a new workflow feature that replaces SharePoint workflows, but it is a Power Platform feature, not a Microsoft 365 feature. You can display approval requests from only Power Automate site. This web part enable to display approval requests from SharePoint site.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
